title: ITGambling
author: ITGambling
content: I have been working as an IT administrator for people and groups of people that do matched betting/value betting/bots etc. for the past 7+ years. I have about 10 customers that are long-term customers, and over 30 in the past 7+ years.Since i can see that more and more people are asking for help with the IT side i decided to offer my services here also to serious bettors, if there are people/groups interested please do not hesitate to contact me.What i can offer:1. Setting up a single PC to use for matched betting/multi accounting etc. (no need to change devices).2. Setting up the best solution for the internet connection, IP addresses, MAC addresses etc.3. Avoid being flagged by using a combination of software solutions and PC tweaks.4. Setting up mobile device emulation or mirroring.5. Help with withdrawals (avoiding usual traps set by bookmakers so they don’t have to pay out), i can help you with their TOS traps.6. Other services to professional gamblers/matched bettors/bonus hunters/multi accounting.***There is no help with being limited on accounts from bookmakers from the same group/or from those who share the user database***It is also worth noting i have many contacts from different parts of industry and if:– You have a business idea related to gambling but you need help…– You have more accounts than you can handle…– You have a way to make money with local shops but you need online accounts that are not accessible in your country…– You have a profitable bot, but lack accounts…Then i am the right person for you, i can help you with maximizing your profit by connecting you with the right people. My fee will be negotiated after we talk about what is it exactly that you need from me. I will not be requesting any upfront payments, so please save your time and mine and contact me only if you are a serious person willing to cooperate and make money.P.S I do not sell any kind of betting accounts, i only work with people that have obtained accounts legally and with consent. Please do not contact me about anything that could be considered illegal.Telegram: @ITGamblingemail: itgabmling@protonmail.com
